Name: Himanshu Bhatt
Title: simple temple.
Review: its a simple temple situated at center of the city , if you are spiritual lover than you can visit and experience it

Name: Gdj
Title: Nice place to visit
Review: Nice place to visit. Most famous lord chitragupta temple in ujjain.a lot of devotee visit there in regular basis.

Name: ashish saxena
Title: CHitragupta mandir is very informative mandir
Review: This temple is a little away from city center, but if you ara really interested in Hindu mythology then you must visit this temple. This is one of oldest temple of God CHITRAGUPT along with God YAAMDEV . you will find Arati of God Chitragupt over here.This temple must be renovated, either MP govt., PURATTAV Deptt. or some BHAMASHAH must adopt this temple for renovation.

Name: Karpagavalli
Title: One of the four temples
Review: This is one of the must visit temple in the city of ujjain dedicated to chitrgupta who has temples dedicated to him in some four cities in india and he is considered to be the assistant of yaman,

Name: akankshacoolgirl
Title: One of a Kind
Review: Shree Chitragupta Dham is dedicated to Lord Chitragupta and is not a very frequently visited temple amongst the locals

Name: Vidhi_sharmah
Title: good one
Review: not many temples are dedicated to lord chitragupta and so this is one of its kind temple and a must visit place

Name: Veer2468
Title: Nice place!
Review: This place is really huge. It is also a holy place. Good place to visit with family. Peaceful and divine

Name: garhwaliya
Title: Big worship place
Review: The infrastructure of this place is very very huge. This is really peaceful place. Many people come here and do the worship here.

Name: Abhishek Shrivastav
Title: Holy Place
Review: Shree chitgragupta maharaj is the lord of kayastha and I belong to the community.Its always special to be in his holy temple.
